remarks: A line covers the atoms it contains.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Apr-2012.)
statement:
lncvrat.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lncvrat.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lncvrat.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
lncvrat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lncvrat.n $e |- N = ( Lines ` K ) $.
lncvrat.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
lncvrat $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ P e. A ) /\ ( ( M ` X ) e. N /\ P .<_ X ) ) -> P C X ) $.
